OOC: Yea, Rauq, Windlord is outside.


Windlord:

"I think that we're safe by now..."said Windlord "But enemies will 
come back"

Looking to Grounded (Is he there) Windlord said "Grounded could you 
tell us the dammage? and... casualties?"

Windlord had the bad feeling that something bad had happened to one 
of Chivtrons
